verbs.description: sorry atiku you [V: ca] n’t buy integrity what is rotten is rotten by churchill okonkwo the political rascal atiku have been attempting to convince nigerians that if elected president he will feed us from the nose while we relax at the foot of adamawa mountain after his selection as the pdp presidential candidate the con artist wasted no time scouting for endorsement to boost his tattered integrity obasanjo churchill okonkwo bishop oyedepo united states churchill vp sherik gumi rascal atiku bar beach nigerian port authority prof wole soyinka atiku bishop david oyedepo american university peter obi david oyedepo npa buhari adamawa mountain president america american university of nigeria fraud brother jero aisha nigeria sahara reporters pdp churchillnnobi lagos apostle peter rev kukah wole soyinka atiku abubakar
